subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin stole the puck and scored the tie-breaking goal with 4 minutes 32 seconds remaining Friday to give the Washington Capitals to a 5-4 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin stole the puck and scored the tie-breaking goal with 4 minutes 32 seconds remaining Friday to give the Washington Capitals to a 5-4 victory over the visiting Philadelphia Flyers.
